questions.author: Philip Putnam
questions.content: How do I create a dynamic route within an ember project?
questions.additionalNotes: I've installed ember utilizing the command: $ ember new <my-project-name> , I've also added an index route and would like to make my route 'user' dynamic/unique

questions.author: Jennifer Barr
questions.content: How do I get a navbar to show up on every page of my site?
questions.additionalNotes: I've installed ember including a few routes, I want to have the same basic header/footer that displays on each page.

questions.author: David Smith
questions.content: Why can't I see my data from my firebase database on my route?
questions.additionalNotes: I've installed ember, emberfire, and placed my firebase information in my config/environment.js. I can see the data when requested/rendered on my route but my component within the route won't render additional database data.

questions.author: Jacob Kuhn
questions.content: Where do I add my custom styling with ember? How about integrating bootstrap?
questions.additionalNotes: I've installed ember but cannot figure out how to add my personal styling or bootstrap

questions.author: Brandon Mallon
questions.content: How do I create a one to many (1:Many) relationship with ember and firebase?
questions.additionalNotes: I've installed ember and created two different models, my firebase is linked correctly as I can see data before linking the two models together but I'm unsure on how to link both of them.

questions.author: Greg Benge
questions.content: How do I create a model and access it?
questions.additionalNotes: I've installed ember but I'm stuck on creating a database to store information and data

questions.author: Cori Casper
questions.content: Why won't my data save to firebase?
questions.additionalNotes: I've installed ember, I can see the data that currently resides in my firebase but I am unable to save data to the firebase using a component!! What gives?!

questions.author: Philip Putnam
questions.content: I can't get my computer to turn on... why?
questions.additionalNotes: I bought this computer from some dude, it won't turn on when I speak to it. I've tried using my phone, Siri just doesn't understand and Google isn't really that helpful.

questions.author: Paul Dorner
questions.content: In an ember project, how do I create a route?
questions.additionalNotes: I've installed ember and would like to have a few different pages

answers.author: Jake Bennett
answers.content: In your console at the top level of your project, type: ember g route <route-name> , where <route-name> is the actual name that you would like your route to be.
